Name: Identify competitors
<action>: identify a table of competitors, including size, position in the market and type of threat
User Story [1]: As the the venture's  CEO I want the platform to generate me a report that includes table of competitors so that I don't have to write it myself, and it should be visible to the executive to influence their strategic planning
User Story [2]: As the the venture's Executive I want the platform to provide me with a report that includes table of competitors to influence strategic planning
Input: List of Competitotrs, Websites, Key variables
Process: Map Competitor business cases compared to own values and to market neeeds
Output: InfoVis competitor landscape report integration including axes and relevance (? Limited value eiren vectors)

<action>: identify a table of competitors, including the SWOT Analyze and Evaluate competition

User Story [2]: As the the venture's Executive I want the platform to provide me with a report that including the SWOT Analyze and Evaluate competition to influence strategic planning

Name: Identify political and regulatory issues

Name: Assess new technology innovations
User Story [1]: As the the venture's  CEO I want the platform to generate me a report that includes table of competitors so that I don't have to write it myself, and it should be visible to the executive to influence their strategic planning
User Story [2]: As the the venture's Executive I want the platform to provide me with a report that includes table of competitors to influence strategic planning
